text: Haaniinae is a subfamily of mantids, now placed in the new (2019) family Haaniidae; species can found in Asia. ==Tribes and Genera== The Mantodea Species File lists two tribes: * tribe Arriini ** Arria (insect) Stal, 1877 ** Sinomiopteryx Tinkham, 1937 * tribe Haaniini ** Astape Stal, 1877 \- monotypic A. denticollis ** Haania Saussure, 1871 ==References== ==Further reading== * * Category:Thespidae Category:Mantodea subfamilies
title: Haaniinae
